name: Pixel Rush - Perfect Run
description:
Slide left and right to control a fragile Pixel Boy.
Avoid obstacles - cannons, giant hammers and rotating slicers and try to get as many pieces to the finish as possible.

Choose your favorite character:
- The original Pixel Boy,
- The Chicken
- Tree Guy

Customise you character with a costume, that fits your style - from a pirate to a unicorn!

Chop, chop - time to run!
